name: study-systemjs-plugin-universal-test
description: :microscope: Studying how to test SystemJS Plugins.

scripts.build: for D in packages/*/src; do [ -d "${D}" ] && babel $D -d $(echo $D | sed -e "s/src/lib/g"); done
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:node
scripts.write-zuul:
COMMIT_SHA1=$(echo $TRAVIS_COMMIT | cut -c1-7 ) && printf "name: $TRAVIS_BRANCH ($COMMIT_SHA1) - $TRAVIS_JOB_NUMBER
ui: tape
browsers:
  - name: $BROWSER_NAME
    version: $BROWSER_VERSION
">.zuul.yml

author: Douglas Duteil <douglasduteil@gmail.com> (douglasduteil.github.io)
